channel.title: Low-Temperature on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Low-Temperature on funPlantGenes

item.title: BRZAT12
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Bra002528 Gene Symbol: BRZAT12 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Brassica campestris Functional Description: BrZAT12 gene could improve the cold resistance of winter B.

item.title: CaNAC1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaNAC1 Gene Name: NAC domain protein 1 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: Transcription factor CaNAC1 regulates low-temperature-induced phospholipid degradation in green bell pepper.

item.title: CiFD
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ciclev10003845m Gene Symbol: CiFD Gene Name: bZIP transcription factor Genome: citrus genome Species: Citrus clementina Functional Descriptions: A bZIP transcription factor (CiFD) regulates drought- and low-temperature-induced flowering by alternative splicing in citrus.

item.title: D2;CYP90D2
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os01g10040 RAPdb gene ID: Os01g0197100 Gene Symbol: D2 CYP90D2 SMG11 OsD2 Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: DgbZIP3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: DgbZIP3 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: DgbZIP3 interacts with DgbZIP2 to increase the expression of DgPOD for cold stress tolerance in chrysanthemum.

item.title: FvMYB10
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FvH4_1g22020 Gene Symbol: FvMYB10 Gene Name: MYB transcription factor 10 Genome: Fragaria vesca ID (v4.

item.title: LcFT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LcFT1 Gene Name: FLOWERING LOCUS T 1 Genome: Species: Litchi chinensis Functional Descriptions: Promoter difference of LcFT1 is a leading cause of natural variation of flowering timing in different litchi cultivars.

item.title: MaNAC1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ma06_g28730 Gene Symbol: MaNAC1 Gene Name: NAC transcription factor1 Genome: banana A genome Species: Musa acuminata Functional Descriptions: Our findings revealed that MaNAC1 performs a vital role as a positive modulator in modulating cell wall cellulose metabolism within banana fruit under chilling stress.

item.title: MdBT2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD06G1161300 Gene Symbol: MdBT2 Gene Name: Genome: Malus × domestica genome GDDH13 v 1.

item.title: MdCBF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD07G1262900 Gene Symbol: MdCBF1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The MdCBF1/MdCBF2-MdTST1/MdTST2 module regulates sugar accumulation in response to low temperature in apple.

item.title: MdCBF2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD01G1196100 Gene Symbol: MdCBF2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The MdCBF1/MdCBF2-MdTST1/MdTST2 module regulates sugar accumulation in response to low temperature in apple.

item.title: MdMYBPA1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdMYBPA1 Gene Name: PA1-type MYB transcription factor 1 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The proanthocyanidin-specific transcription factor MdMYBPA1 initiates anthocyanin synthesis under low-temperature conditions in red-fleshed apples.

item.title: MdTST1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD06G1005100 Gene Symbol: MdTST1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The MdCBF1/MdCBF2-MdTST1/MdTST2 module regulates sugar accumulation in response to low temperature in apple.

item.title: MdTST2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD10G1142100 Gene Symbol: MdTST2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The MdCBF1/MdCBF2-MdTST1/MdTST2 module regulates sugar accumulation in response to low temperature in apple.

item.title: PmCBF03
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PmCBF03 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Prunus mume Functional Descriptions: A low-temperature transcription factor PmCBF03 on chromosome 7 through adaptive analysis of populations at different altitudes, which has an early termination single nucleotide polymorphism mutation.
